Team Rocket at {{name}}
Weather change!
embed.description:
NB! The weather for some active mons have changed from {{oldweather}} {{oldweatheremoji}} to {{weather}} {{weatheremoji}}!
This could have altered the reported IV!

embed.title: Welcome
embed.description:
Thank you for registering 
Please set a location `{{prefix}}location name of place` or add ares where to receive alarms from

fields.name: General commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}poracle`: Adds you to database and enables tracking 
`{{prefix}}unregister`: Removes you from tracking 
`{{prefix}}stop`: Temporarily stops alarms 
`{{prefix}}start`: Re-enables alarms 
`{{prefix}}location yourArea`: Searches for yourArea and sets it as your location 
`{{prefix}}area add somePlace`: Sets one or multiple areas where to receive alarms from, areas need to be configured by admin 
`{{prefix}}area remove somePlace`: Removes a configured area 
 `{{prefix}}tracked`: Shows you what you are currently configured to be notified about. 
 `{{prefix}}help`: Shows this message

fields.name: **Basic Examples**
fields.value:
You probably want to start off with something like these 4 commands. Change the distances (d=metres) to suit yourself. 
 `{{prefix}}location 123 Common Road, Town, Region` 
 `{{prefix}}track archen axew gible gabite cranidos deino zweilous litwick lampent riolu darumaka unown d1500` 
 `{{prefix}}raid timburr litwick d1500` 
 `{{prefix}}track everything iv100 d1000`

fields.name: Monster tracking commands
fields.value:
The command needs to include at least one monster and any amount of filters. E.g. 
 `{{prefix}}track snorlax lapras d500 iv50 maxiv90 cp1000 level15`: This command would alert you about Snorlax and Lapras within 500 meters of your location, with an IV between 50% - 90%, of at least level 15, and a minimum CP of 1000. 
`{{prefix}}untrack lapras vileplume`: will remove tracking for lapras and vileplume 
 See more options and details at [the manual](https://kartuludus.github.io/PoracleJS/#/commands?id=track)

fields.name: Raid tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}raid snorlax lapras d500 instinct`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about snorlax and lapras raids within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct 
`{{prefix}}raid remove lapras vileplume`: will remove tracking for lapras and vileplume raids

fields.name: Raid egg tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}egg level3 d500 instinct`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about level 3 raid eggs within 500 meters of your location or inside an added area. The set filters require the Gym to be controlled by team Instinct 
`{{prefix}}egg remove level3`: will remove tracking for level 3 raid eggs

fields.name: Quest tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}quest porygon pikachu rare_candy silver_pinap_berry d500`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about Quests obtainable within 500m of your location with porygon, pikachu, rare candy, or silver pinaps as rewards 
 `{{prefix}}quest remove all_items`: Removes tracking for all item based quests. Can also use `all_pokemon` or `stardust`

fields.name: Invasion tracking commands
fields.value:
`{{prefix}}invasion d500 dragon mixed`: Any arguments are optional, this command would alert you about Team Rocket Incidents within 500m of your location if the grunt type was mixed or dragon. You can use any pokemon type name.
 `{{prefix}}invasion remove dragon`: Removes tracking for specified Team Rocket Incidents.
